quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Let your light so shine before men.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: A cheerful heart is good medicine.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best antidote I know for worry is work.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: You don't have to be perfect to be loved.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
quotes.author: King David

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Lift where you stand.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: It is your reaction to adversity, not the adversity itself, that determines how your life's story will develop.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Hold on. Hope on.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil.
quotes.author: Jeremiah

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
quotes.author: King David

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is youer than you.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: However late you think you are, however many chances you think you have missed, you have not traveled beyond the reach of divine love.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.text: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.text: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: said Frodo.
said Gandalf,
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Be still, and know that I am God.
quotes.author: King David

quotes.text: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God.
quotes.author: Isaiah

quotes.text: Try a little harder to be a little better.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The Lord loves effort.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The joy we feel has little to do with the circumstances of our lives and everything to do with the focus of our lives.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.text: Don't you quit. You keep walking. You keep trying. There is help and happiness ahead.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.text: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: They that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles.
quotes.author: Isaiah

quotes.text: A soft answer turneth away wrath.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Decisions determine destiny.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Getting old is like climbing a mountain; you get a little out of breath, but the view is much better.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.text: You know you've reached middle age when you're cautioned to slow down by your doctor, instead of by the police.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: A pleasure is not full grown until it is remembered.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: What you see and what you hear depends a great deal on where you are standing. It also depends on what sort of person you are.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Water is fluid, soft, and yielding. But water will wear away rock, which is rigid and cannot yield. As a rule, whatever is fluid, soft, and yielding will overcome whatever is rigid and hard.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Life is to be enjoyed, not endured.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: You're off to great places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: A person's a person, no matter how small.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: You'll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.text: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: Even miracles take a little time.
quotes.author: Fairy Godmother, Cinderella

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Rafiki, The Lion King

quotes.text: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: Integrity is doing the right thing even when no one is watching.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: What! You too? I thought I was the only one.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: We can ignore reality, but we cannot ignore the consequences of ignoring reality.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: We read to know we are not alone.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Isn't it funny how day by day nothing changes, but when you look back, everything is different.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: To love at all is to be vulnerable.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Be who God meant you to be and you will set the world on fire.
quotes.author: St. Catherine of Siena

quotes.text: I have learned that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.text: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: We cannot do great things on this earth, only small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but I am bound to live by the light that I have.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: When we long for life without difficulties, remember that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.text: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.text: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.text: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.text: Those who have a 'why' to live, can bear with almost any 'how'.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.text: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.text: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is better to light a candle than curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: The least of things with a meaning is worth more in life than the greatest of things without it.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Faith does not eliminate questions. But faith knows where to take them.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.text: The secret to so many artists living so long is that every painting is a new adventure. So, you see, they're always looking ahead to something new and exciting.
quotes.author: Norman Rockwell

quotes.text: Tell me to what you pay attention and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: José Ortega y Gasset

quotes.text: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou
